detail_desc: Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit, longer at the back.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit, longer at the back.

V-neck shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Relaxed fit.

V-neck shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Relaxed fit.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a print motif on the front and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in velour with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.

Set with a pair of soft, shimmering metallic ballet slippers and an elastic hairband. Slippers with a scalloped top edge, glittery elastic strap over the foot, cotton jersey linings and insoles and soft, imitation suede soles. Hairband with a chiffon flower on top.

Leotard in stretch jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a motif with glittery details on the front. Seam at the waist, a tiered, satin-lined tulle skirt and a detachable tulle cape with a shimmering pattern.
Leather sandals with crossover straps and a decorative bow on the front, and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Leather and rubber insoles and rubber soles.
Leather sandals with crossover straps and a decorative bow on the front, and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Leather and rubber insoles and rubber soles.
Dance shoes with elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Fancy dress cape in a transparent, patterned weave with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the top. Hood with a padded crown on top and a pile trim that continues down the front opening.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Set with a sleeveless romper suit and a long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned romper suit with a kangaroo pocket, press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch, and ribbed hems. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder.

Set with three wrapover bodysuits, two pairs of leggings, a romper suit, hat and scratch mittens in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved bodysuits with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist. Romper with short sleeves and legs, and press-studs at the side. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem, and scratch mittens with ribbed cuffs.
